Definition: Dairy breed whose parentage comprises greater than 12/16ths (>75%) Holstein-Friesian.
Dairy breed whose parentage comprises greater than 12/16ths (>75%) Jersey.
Dairy breed whose parentage is comprised of Holstein-Friesian and Jersey, but with no dominant (i.e. greater than 12/16ths) breed.
Dairy breeds that are not Holstein-Friesian, Jersey or Holstein-Friesian Jersey Cross.
